name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: X3Coupons - Provide discount code for 300k+ brand

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays coupons for the current website.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Description: X3Coupons is a smart browser extension designed to help you save money while shopping online. This extension automatically finds and applies the best discount codes for the websites you visit, ensuring you never miss out on a great deal.

Features:
	Automatic URL Check:
		Each time you open a new tab or navigate to a website, X3Coupons automatically captures the URL.
		The extension checks this URL against its extensive database to find any available discount codes for the site.

	Display Discount Code List:
		If discount codes are found, X3Coupons presents a list of available codes directly in your browser.
		The codes are sorted by the best deals, allowing you to quickly choose the most beneficial one.

	Instant Notifications:
		When you visit a website with available discount codes, a small notification will pop up to inform you of the current offers.
		You can easily click on the notification to view detailed information about the discount codes.

	Apply Discount Codes:
		With a single click, you can copy a discount code and apply it at the website's checkout page.
		The extension also offers an option to automatically apply the best discount code when you reach the checkout step, saving you time and ensuring you always get the best deal.

	Reasons to Install X3Coupons:
		Save Time and Money: No need to manually search for discount codes on other websites. X3Coupons does it for you in seconds.
		User-Friendly: With a clear interfaca and straightforward notifications, accessing and using discount codes is hassle-free.
		Constantly Updated: X3Coupons' database is continuously updated with the latest discount codes, ensuring you always have access to the best deals.
		Completely Free: The extension is entirely free to use and does not contain intrusive ads, providing an excellent user experience.

With X3Coupons, online shopping becomes easier and more cost-effective than ever. Install it now and start enjoying fantastic discounts from over 300,000 brands on your favorite websites!
